#general MoccaCalendar.calendar=Kalendārs MoccaCalendar.calendar.title=Kalendāra apskats MoccaCalendar.calendar.defaultCalendarTitle=Citi notikumi MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewall=Visu kalendāru apskats ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.viewSubscribed=Subscribed calendars MoccaCalendar.calendar.create=Izveidot jaunu kalendāru ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.subscribe=Subscribe to a calendar MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist=plāns MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titlepast=Pagājuši notikumi MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.titleupcoming=Gaidāmi notikumi MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.nopastevents=Nav atrasti pagājuši notikumi. MoccaCalendar.calendar.plainlist.noupcomingevents=Nav atrasti gaidāmi notikumi. MoccaCalendar.calendar.firstDayOfWeek=1 ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.readonly=This is a read only calendar and you can not create events for it. ### Missing: MoccaCalendar.calendar.noevent=This page does not contain an event. ## event sheets ### Missing: moccacalendar.sheets.generic.noevent=This page cannot be displayed in the calendar. {0}View it{1} as wiki page instead. ### Missing: moccacalendar.sources.config.label=Configure events from source \u00AB{0}\u00BB
## Calendar macro ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.addObject.description=This action will transform the current calendar macro in a dedicated Calendar page. This will allow further customizations of color schemes and you will find it in the Calendar overview. Note that any other content on this page will be added in the calendar description. The action is irreversible! ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.addObject.button=Add calendar class
## Calendar macro rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Mocca Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Displays a Calendar ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Show events from ... ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Calendar page ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList' ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Saturday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00) ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00) ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gCal.name=gCal ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gCal.description=Google calendar IDs separated by commas. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gApiKey.name=gApiKey ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.gApiKey.description=Key for the Google Calendar API. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.iCal.name=iCal ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.iCal.description=The iCalendar URL. ### Missing: xwiki.calendar.button.plainList=Agenda
